text: This list is of the Intangible Cultural Properties of Japan in the Prefecture of Gifu. ==National Cultural Properties== As of 1 July 2015, four Important Intangible Cultural Properties have been designated, being of national significance. ===Craft Techniques=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:100%;" |- !width="25%" align="left" | Property !width="25%" align="left" | Holder !width="35%" align="left" class="unsortable" | Comments !width="10%" align="left" class="unsortable" | Image !width="5%" align="left" class="unsortable" | Ref. |- | align="center"|Hon-Minoshi Hon-Minoshi || || the handmade paper of Mino is recorded in Engishiki and referenced in the inscription of "Washi, craftsmanship of traditional Japanese hand-made paper" on the UNESCO Representative List of the Intangible Cultural Heritage of Humanity || || |- | align="center"|Shino Shino || || ceramic tradition dating from the Momoyama period || 150px || |- | align="center"|Seto-guro Seto-guro || || ceramic tradition dating from the Momoyama period; the black wares are removed from the kiln during firing and doused with water || || |- | align="center"|Monsha Monsha || || textile tradition || || |- |} ==Prefectural Cultural Properties== As of 2 March 2015, five properties have been designated at a prefectural level. ===Craft Techniques=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:100%;" |- !width="25%" align="left" | Property !width="25%" align="left" | Holder !width="35%" align="left" class="unsortable" | Comments !width="10%" align="left" class="unsortable" | Image !width="5%" align="left" class="unsortable" | Ref. |- | align="center"|Mino Tradition of Japanese Swordsmithing Mino-den nihontō tanren gihō || || || || |- | align="center"|Gujō Indigo Dyeing Gujō honzome || || || || |- | align="center"|Shino Shino || , , || || || |- | align="center"|Ki-Seto ki-Seto || || yellow Seto || || |- | align="center"|Oribe Oribe || || || 150px || |- |} ==Municipal Cultural Properties== As of 1 May 2014, thirty properties have been designated at a municipal level. ==References== ==External links== * Cultural Properties in Gifu Prefecture Category:Culture in Gifu Prefecture Category:Lists of Intangible Cultural Properties of Japan
title: List of Intangible Cultural Properties of Japan (Gifu)
